/** * An standard implementation of a line decoration. It draws a shape which * is rotated and moved to the end of the line. The shape is scaled by the * stroke width. * * @author Werner Randelshofer * @version 2.0 2006-01-14 Changed to support double precison coordinates. *
1.0 2003-12-01 Derived from JHotDraw 5.4b1. */
